sentences.sentence: A little later, of course, she, this nouvelle, this Lolita, my Lolita, was to eclipse completely her prototype.
sentences.translation: 当然，片刻之后，她，这个洛丽塔，我的洛丽塔，便要彻底遮蔽她的原型。

sentences.sentence: In addition she has affiliated herself with the "La nouvelle manga" movement.
sentences.translation: 此外，她所属的“法国新漫画”运动的自己。

sentences.sentence: A little later of course she, this nouvelle, this Lolita, my Lolita, was to eclipse completely her prototype.
sentences.translation: 当然片刻之后她，这个洛丽塔，我的洛丽塔，便要彻底遮蔽她天体的原色。
